author: bridge-bot
content: <yoavw> He meant that it sent spam/scam messages here, originating from discord.  I deleted the message itself already. (re @CarlBeek: Oh really? Testing discord bot)

author: bridge-bot
content:
<Highlander1969> Following up on the RollCall on fee markets and possible transaction fee API. The EEA-Oasis L2 Standards WG is starting to discuss an L2 transaction fee API spec. A 1st proposal is here: https://github.com/eea-oasis/L2/issues/51

Thought to share it here to inspire discussions. Those interested to directly discuss can also join the WG call tomorrow at 7 am pst/10 am est/4 pm CET/6:30 pm IST.

DM me if you are interested and want to attend and I will either share the zoom link or add you to the meeting invite.
